regexCodeList.string: ^You have been branded with a voidmark by the Avatar of the Other!$
With two bowls before you, you work through a line of eggs.
Try as you might, the eggs in the barrel foil you.
You begin to peel
Steadily working your knife
You begin to clean some shrimp
With a THUNK of your knife,
You quickly begin to peel
Leaving long, thin orange
You begin to strip the leaves
Working through the tethered handfuls of herbs
You rip the skin off of a handful
You peel the outer husk
Thrusting your thumb along
You force your thumb along
You lazily begin to strip
Gaze unfocusing with the monotony
You begin to chop lemons in
You grab a lemon and roll it
You begin to pluck the feathers from a chicken, inhaling some of its down.
You deftly strip a chicken of its feathers
You hack into the pig carcass,
Alternating between blades,
You cut into a fish,
Deftly making cuts along the spine and behind the gills
You hack into the cow carcass
Already stripped of its hide,
You vaguely cut into the various pieces
You sort through the offal
You nearly cut off your hand as you try
Carefully maneouvering a saw,

regexCodeList.string: [HINT]: GRAB CARCASS FROM COLDROOM
You pull the canvas away from the carcass
Your input, 'prep carcass'
Crunching down on a kernel, you find the spice has an earthy, smoky burn to it, coarse and best paired with other spices.
A quick nip of the root intensifies the sharp spice, warm and somewhat woody upon your tongue.
Venturing to taste the plant, the sharp, garlicy herb has an almost soapy flavour, aromatic and overpowering on its own.
The raw spice is unpalatabely bitter, though the cured one packs a lot of flavour all at once: salty, sour, herbal, and somewhat medicinal.
Somewhat grassy, a quick sample of the spice reveals bitter undertones.
A quick sample of the pale leaf reveals a somewhat spring-like quality to its anise-like flavour.
You dab a finger into the spice and quickly taste it. The spice is warm and overwhelming, sweet undertones blending it from savoury to dessert applications.
Tasting one of its leaves, you can feel its aromatic nature rise into your sinuses, fragrant with an earthy evergreen undertone.
Wetting a fingertip, you sample the powder and find it has a warm burn upon your tongue, intense and somewhat bitter in its purity.
A quick dab reveals a nutty, slightly sweet flavor that would complement desserts.
You read a notice regarding admittance to the school. Do you wish to take the taste test? YES or NO.
Licking the end of the root, you find that it has a bitter, slightly aromatic taste that would complement other spices.
The leaf has a sharp, bitter taste as you sample its edge, which is sharp against your tongue.
Licking a fingertip, you dab it into the powder and sample it. While pungent, the powder tastes a bit sweeter than expected, but still overwhelmes your palate on its own.
Biting the corner of the herb, you find its taste to have a slight, peppery burn to it that is both savory and sweet.
Biting the leaf's edge, your tongue is met with an earthy, savory, and woody taste.
The spice has an earthy, woody flavour with spiced and smoky notes.
[HINT]: You can ATTEND NOVICE CLASS once a week to begin a cooking class
[HINT]: Do KITCHEN SETUP to prepare your kitchen area.

Trigger.name: Fishing Line Prompt (for deciding to cut/lead/reel)
Trigger.script:
if currently_fishing and fish_update then
fish_update = false
local linestrength = matches[2] local fishstrength = matches[3] local distance = matches[4]
if tonumber(linestrength) >= 95 and tonumber(distance) >= 10 then send("qeb fishing cut", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) >= 90 and tonumber(distance) >= 30 then send("qeb fishing cut", false) elseif tonumber(fishstrength) >= 25 then send("qeb fishing lead", false) elseif tonumber(linestrength) <= 100 then send("qeb fishing reel", false)
end
end deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: ^Line: (\d+)\% Fish: (\d+)\% Distance: (\d+)\%$

Trigger.name: Fishing Cast
Trigger.script: fish_update = true Fishtick = 0 currently_fishing = true deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: With a fluid flick of your wrist, you loose the fishhook from its holding place and cast your line into the water.
You use Fishing Cast.

Trigger.name: CaptureFishingHole
Trigger.script:
-- Make sure tables actually exist. if not fishing_holes then load_fishing_db() end
fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]] or {}
-- Get some basic data. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].name = multimatches[1][2] fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].type = multimatches[2][2]
-- Track the room. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms or {} local found_room = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms) do if v == gmcp.Room.Info.num then found_room = true break end end if not found_room then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].rooms, gmcp.Room.Info.num) end
-- Format the fishing hole contents string so that it can be parsed. multimatches[2][3] = "|" .. multimatches[2][3]:gsub(", ", "||") .. "|" multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub(" and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|and ", "||") multimatches[2][3] = multimatches[2][3]:gsub("%|%|%|", "||")
-- Iterate over the fishing hole contents and get the fish in the hole. local temp_fish = {} for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|%d+ of ([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end for ftype in multimatches[2][3]:gmatch("%|([%w%s%'%-]+)%|") do local skip = false for tmp in ftype:gmatch("%d of ") do skip = true break end if not skip then table.insert(temp_fish, ftype) end end
-- Make sure our fishing table exists before checking it in the following loop. fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish = fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish or {} for k, v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if v == "unfamiliar creatures" then table.remove(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, k) break end end
for _, ftype in pairs(temp_fish) do local found = false for k,v in pairs(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish) do if ftype == v then found = true break end end if not found then table.insert(fishing_holes[multimatches[1][2]].fish, ftype) end end
-- Save data. save_fishing_db()

Trigger.name: no more
Trigger.script: snd.message("\nAutofishing disabled. Either no more fish or your bucket is full.") Fishingcaught = false Fishtick = 0 if currently_fishing then send("qeb fishing cut", false) end currently_fishing = false fish_update = false deleteFull()

regexCodeList.string: You sense that you will be unable to catch any of the fish that remain here.

Trigger.name: Fishing Tick
Trigger.script: if Fishingcaught then send("qeb fishing reel", false) end Fishtick = Fishtick + 1 if tonumber(Fishtick) > 15 then send("qeb fishing discern", false) end fish_update = true deleteFull()

Trigger.name: Fishing stopped
Trigger.script: Fishingcaught = false Fishtick = 0 currently_fishing = false fish_update = false deleteFull() snd.message("\nYou stopped fishing!")

Trigger.name: snowball
Trigger.script:
snowballs = snowballs or 0 if snowballs == 0 then send('wt new batch of snowballs! Danger!') end
snowballs=snowballs+1
cecho("<red>"..snowballs)
if snowTimer then killTimer(snowTimer) end snowTimer = tempTimer(6,function() cecho("<red> END OF WAVE") snowballs = 0 end)

temples as well as Her priestess, Sekhtet?"] = "Fordrock", ["Who blew up the Silver Spire?"] = "Saayar", ["Who was/is the Emperor of the Nazedha?"] = "Baelak", ["Which place did the ophidians once ["Who bestowed the mantle of the Templars to the original Paladin guild?"] = "Duamvi", ["What was the name of the hawk that was Lord Arion's essence and attempted to thwart Lord Severn?"] = "Avegnon", ["What was the name of Lord Rahn's falcon?"] = "Gloria", ["What sort of machinery did the mortals of Sapience use to assault the Almighty Kerrithrim?"] = "Catapults", ["What was Belladona's former name?"] = "Yrtez", ["What was the name of the Infernal-related House that resided in early Bloodloch?"] = "Acerbus Ferratus", ["What is the name of Lord Damariel's lance?"] = "Maraxis", ["What did Lanos use to seal the breach between the Shadow Plane and the Prime Material Plane?"] = "The sword of truth", ["Who prophecized about the coming of the Three Children?"] = "Azaeru", ["Which of these is the newest crafting skill or talent?"] = "Luthier", ["Which of the following did the Landmarks of old not affect?"] = "The strength of the Consanguine", ["Who was the last ruler of the Troll royal family?"] = "Juxa", ["Which guild once held a monopoly on venom sales?"] = "The Shadowsnakes", ["Who was the last mortal shell of Arion, Lord of Valor?"] = "Syvelium", ["Which of the following word is the correct term to refer to people from Enorian?"] = "Enorianites", ["What was the primary language of the Ankyrean Order?"] = "Ankyrean", ["How many stable numbers are used in the practice of to the city of Enorian in its early days?"] = "Locusts", ["What is the name of the Enorianite prophet of the Gods of Light?"] = "Kayalenki", ["Which of the following venoms was invented most recently?"] = "Jalk", ["Where did the seed that started the formation of the Flame of Yggdrasil come from?"] = "A gardener", ["Who created the suicide mice in the year 87 MA?"] = "Merentesh", ["Who = "Reliquaries", ["What is the name of the satyr of Scidve?"] = "Silenos", ["Which of the following is not the name of a Nazedha Chaos Lord?"] = "Jhaki", ["What is the name of the Praexi singer who performed in the Celebration of the Stars?"] = "Altan Dula", ["What does the Kalsu word 'rellyw' literally mean?"] = "Pet", ["What circle of the Akkari does the Exarch Aban lead?"] = "Il'ahji", ["Who Golgotha?"] = "Golrath", ["What was the name of the alchemist Jirken's great-granddaughter?"] = "Jehanne", ["In Salurian mythology, what was the name of the God who opposed to Ati?"] = "Erxotl", imprisoning Jox was made of what?"] = "Starmetal", ["In what year was the Grand Aetolian Library burnt down?"] = "436 MA", ["What does the Hlugnic word 'endoron' mean?"] = "Mage", ["Of whom is "Ruin", ["Iosyne won what from Maghak in a game of dice?"] = "Her Heart", ["What was Aetolia's first arena called?"] = "The Fields of Valor", ["What was Inesse's name changed from, and by whom?"] = "Vixen, Auresae", ["What is deemed the first true Arqeshi settlement on Sapience?"] = "Jaru", ["How many Conclaves made up the Ankyrean Order?"] = "Five", ["Who was the first God to attack the Kerrithrim?"] = "Arion", ["The Aslinn hideout assaulted in the Clawhook Range was called what?"] = "The Maul", ["Which monarch presides over the Riparium?"] = "King Nissandar", ["Which race was used as shock troops by the Indorani Empire?"] = "Ogre", ["Who built the village of Mrenadh?"] = "The Alizarin Order", ["Who was the leader of the Aztob?"] = "Ayeli", ["What was used to destroy the corpse "Iviofiyiedu", ["What were the vermin in Ashtan during its three Isles time?"] = "Seagulls", ["Which God is responsible for the demise of Niuri?"] = "Ivoln", ["Which now lost art was practised by the ["What is Omei's name in Kalsu?"] = "Lurli", ["With which city did Baelak Shipbreaker first form an alliance?"] = "Bloodloch", ["Llazuth pledged allegience to Iosyne in exchange for help destroying who?"] = "Zsarachnor", ["By what title was Amal best known?"] = "The Soldier", ["Who founded the town of Arbothia?"] = "Therans", ["In which Age were both the Dun Fortress and Azdun founded?"] = "Despair", ["Who was the founder of the Cabal in the Midnight Age?"] = "Eocik, the Numerologist", ["By what name is Aevoi fio Oihia better known?"] = "The Sun", ["What was the full name of the Cogger that tried to destroy Spinesreach?"] = "Copperhead of the Third Spoke", ["What was Savhien's title?"] = "Champion of the Gods", ["In what year was the town of Arbothia founded?"] = "130 Midnight", ["What plane is a 'Hyriamah' from?"] = "Rewh'va", ["What popular game from Azhoa was brought to Aetolia?"] = "King's Abdication", ["What is the oldest fortress of Dehkay Plateau?"] = "Neicel Arget", ["The isle the Tidesages originate from is called what?"] = "Keltund", ["Which Elder God introduced King's Abdication to Sapience?"] = "Helera", ["Which four Gods fought Ati and Murgraxis in the first War of Night?"] = "Auresae, Chakrasul, Damariel, and Slyphe", ["Who was the first general to fall in the second war of night?"] = "Agrimarha, Fallen Adherent", ["Which divine was born from the essence of Chakrasul and Khepri?"] = "Ysmali", ["Who was the Sage of Ulangi?"] = "Oorangu", ["What is the modern name of the Castle of Illumination?"] = "Tiyen Indoron", ["By which Azhoan term are Dia'ruis herolt_questions[matches[2]] then tempTimer(3, [[ send("say ]]..herolt_questions[matches[2]]..[[") ]]) else snd.send("echo Don't have that answer.") end

The air before you ripples with energy

Trigger.name: Loyalty Line
Trigger.script: Whomst.owner = matches[2] deleteLine() tempTimer(0, [[Whomst.announce()]]) setTriggerStayOpen("Delivery Arrived", 0)

regexCodeList.string: ^.* is loyal to (.*)\.$

Trigger.name: Tally Damage To Temp
Trigger.script:
if not huntdata.tmpdata then huntdata.newtmp() end local dmg = tonumber(matches[2])
--This SHOULD eliminate tracking of things like sacrifice. if dmg == 50 or dmg == 58 then return end
--Add the hit, and the damage dealt by it. huntdata.tmpdata.hits = huntdata.tmpdata.hits + 1 huntdata.tmpdata.damage = huntdata.tmpdata.damage + tonumber(matches[2])
huntdata.lastslain = getEpoch() huntdata.tmpslain = nil

regexCodeList.string: ^Damage done\: (\d+)

Trigger.name: Tally Crit To Temp
Trigger.script:
if not huntdata.tmpdata then huntdata.newtmp() end
local crit = matches[3]:lower() local cType = { critical = "2x", ["staggering critical"] = "4x", ["crushing critical"] = "8x", ["mutilating critical"] = "16x", ["annihilating critical"] = "32x", }
--Add the crit hit. huntdata.tmpdata.crits = huntdata.tmpdata.crits + 1
--Find the multiplier of crit, and add it. for name, mult in pairs(cType) do if crit == name then huntdata.tmpdata.crittable[mult] = huntdata.tmpdata.crittable[mult] + 1 break end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You have scored (a|an) (.+) hit\!

Trigger.name: Tally Slain To Temp
Trigger.script:
if not huntdata.tmpdata then huntdata.newtmp() end
if huntdata.tmpslain then return end huntdata.tmpslain = true
huntdata.tmpdata.slain = huntdata.tmpdata.slain + 1
huntdata.tmpdata.killed[matches[2]] = huntdata.tmpdata.killed[matches[2]] or 0 huntdata.tmpdata.killed[matches[2]] = huntdata.tmpdata.killed[matches[2]] + 1

regexCodeList.string: ^The final blow is too much, you have slain (.+).$
^Having slain (.+)\, you retrieve the corpse.$
^You have slain (.+)\.$

Trigger.name: Tally Experience To Temp

huntdata.tmpdata.exp = huntdata.tmpdata.exp + xp

regexCodeList.string: ^Experience Gained\: (\d+)

Trigger.name: Tally Mist To Temp

local xp = tonumber(matches[2])
if not huntdata.tmpdata then huntdata.newtmp() end
huntdata.tmpdata.mists = huntdata.tmpdata.mists + 1

Trigger.name: Denizens in room
Trigger.script: deleteLine() if identify_list[matches[3]] ~= nil then identify_list[matches[3]] = string.format("%s|%s", identify_list[matches[3]], matches[2]) else identify_list[matches[3]] = matches[2] end

Trigger.name: bloodscan line
Trigger.script:
-- selectString(line, 1) replace"" -- -- -- get the name -- cecho("<green>"..matches[2].."<reset>: "..string.rep(" ", 10 - string.len(matches[2]))) -- -- -- ids -- mmp.echonums(matches[3]) -- -- -- pad spaces so we have aligned roomname -- echo(string.rep(" ", 25 - #getCurrentLine())) -- -- -- and finally, the roomname -- echo(matches[3]) -- -- -- if mmp.tempscent[matches[3]] then -- mmp.tempscent[matches[3]][#mmp.tempscent[matches[3]]+1] = matches[2] -- else -- mmp.tempscent[matches[3]] = {matches[2]} -- end -- -- -- save in our person tracking db -- mmp.pdb[matches[2]] = matches[3] -- mmp.pdb_lastupdate[matches[2]] = true
deleteLine() if identify_list[matches[3]] ~= nil then identify_list[matches[3]] = string.format("%s|%s", identify_list[matches[3]], matches[2]) else identify_list[matches[3]] = matches[2] end

regexCodeList.string: ^You detect (\w+) at (.+)\.$
The soil is covered in fresh grass
Tall grass and large weeds
An ilmenite hoe in hand, you get to work on the field
A plot of farmland.
At the front gate.

Trigger.name: Parse wholist2
Trigger.script:
deleteLine() if matches[2] and matches[3] and matches[4] then cecho("<cyan> 
" .. matches[2] .. "<red>AREA: " ..mmp.getAreaName(matches[4])) echoLink(" [GOTO]", [[expandAlias("goto ]] .. matches[4] .. [[")]], "GOTO " .. matches[4], true) cecho("<yellow> VNUM: " ..matches[4]) elseif matches[2] and matches[3] and not matches[4] then --cecho("<cyan> 
" .. matches[2] .. "<red> AREA: UNKNOWN VNUM: UNKOWN") elseif matches[2] and not matches[3] and not matches[4] then --cecho("<cyan> 
" .. matches[2] .. "AREA: UNKNOWN VNUM: UNKOWN") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your efficiency defence now has (\d+) stacks.$
^Your efficiency defence now has (\d+) stack.$
^You are prepared for utmost efficiency (\d+) more times.$
^You are prepared for utmost efficiency (\d+) more time.$
You already possess a mind for efficient action.

Trigger.name: Used Efficiency
Trigger.script:
snd.efficiency = true
if snd.efficiencycount == "1" then snd.efficiencycount = 0 snd.efficiency = false end

regexCodeList.string: Your alacrity speeds up your actions.
Chaos traps have been prepared in the following locales:

Trigger.name: Field stuff
Trigger.script: --snd.send("qeb field stake trellis") snd.send("qeb field harvest") --snd.send("qeb field plant godstongue")

At the front gate.
^(Web): (\w+) says, "Basher off!"$
infected with a mutagen.

Trigger.name: Torch
Trigger.script: expandAlias("stap") snd.set_queue("qeb give torch to sitai")

regexCodeList.string: (Web): Sitai says, "Torch."
